elements.name: Verify Category Details API response with valid data

steps.name: I send a GET request to the Category Details API
the response status code should be 200
the response body should contain Name as "Carbon credits"
the response body should contain CanRelist as true
the Promotions element with Name "Gallery" should have Description containing "Good position in category"
